trans-unit.source: Choose how to render this answer
This title is a short description of this answer and is displayed as identifier in the list module by default
You can set points for this answer, which in the end add up with points of other answers
This is the answer text the participant sees in the frontend
Define if this is the correct answer
You can set a validation type to check the user input
Text or keywords (comma separated) to compare to the answer of the participant
Number of keywords that must be met in the answer. If value is 0, all keywords must be met

Count the appearances of the given term and define which one should be replaced. Example: Within the cloze test the term "internet" appears two times. You want the participant to replace the second term only. Thus you set the value to 2. Standard is: 1

The answer must be saved with an image before you can use the wizard!!!
Coordinates for Baloontext: Coordinates of the input on the image, Coordinates for Drag&Drop: Coordinates for Dropdown Areas
If you add a title after the last coordinate in the line, separate it with a comma and it will be shown in the D&D area.

Values for the select box
Please use the following format:
one select entry per line
value:shown text
If value and shown text should be the same, you only need to enter the value without following :
